data.name: Covid Carl
data.detailed_description:
Covid Carl is a Metroidvania/Contra-style 2d side-scrolling shooter. It will feature a brief story, 10 levels, and boss fights.


Covid Carl was born out of frustration in dealing with certain societal elements during the Covid-19 pandemic. But, let's be honest though. I'm not producing something that's AAA. You can run, jump, and shoot. I fully expect that the end product will be a mostly well-functioning dumpster fire. But if it provides whoever pays a pittance for it with a modicum of entertainment, then I'll consider this endeavor a success. This isn't going to be a work of art, but it is my magnum opus.

data.short_description: Covid Carl is a Metroidvania/Contra-style 2d side-scrolling shooter. It will feature a brief story, 10 levels, and boss fights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want to hear the sounds. Don't expect anything spectacular though.

content_descriptors.notes: This game will contain mature content such as pixel violence, death, making fun of certain military leadership styles and concepts, and certain military actions concerning the Covid-19 vaccine.
